name: Lost Maze
description:
Lost Maze

A  small maze game, inspired in Gameboy palette. 

A small little creature in format of a bean (a witch friend), gets lost in a forest, and the only way to escape it is going through a very big maze. Will they escape in time? 

Features
  • 10 Levels
  • 15-30Min 
  • A Small Friend

Notes: This is my first game, it was very hard to make because the lack of coding,  there was suppose to have more content, but I hope u enjoy nonetheless!
